aka: A Video For My Friend's Wedding
playdate: 2022-01-10(布宜诺斯艾利斯国际纪录片电影节)
trans_title: A Video For My Friend's Wedding
introduction: Kaiyuan, who studied film in Beijing Film Academy, returned to his hometown Fenyang during the Chinese New Year. At the invitation of his high school classmate Gao Peng, he was the wedding photographer of Gao Peng and Xiaoyu to shoot wedding documentaries for them. During the week, Kaiyuan followed them to record Fenyang. Bit by bit in the county town, the camera seems to have discovered the secret of the death of their common high school classmate Wang Jie while following the protagonist... and it stirred up the storm before the wedding. In the end, the couple held the wedding smoothly, but the storms of life won't stop because of ...
